sqlquery.name: SQL_Fault_FirstCategory
sqlquery.select: select distinct c650000001 clist,substr(c650000005,1,2) ccode from {WF:Config_EL_00_NetType} order by ccode

sqlquery.name: SQL_Fault_SecondCategory
sqlquery.select: select distinct c650000001||'.'||c650000002 clist,substr(c650000005,1,4) ccode from {WF:Config_EL_00_NetType} where 1=1 #strParent# $directpar$ order by ccode

sqlquery.name: SQL_Fault_ThirdCategory
sqlquery.select: select distinct c650000001||'.'||c650000002||'.'||c650000004 clist,c650000005 ccode from {WF:Config_EL_00_NetType} where 1=1 $directpar$ #strParent# order by ccode

sqlquery.name: SQL_Fault_Province
sqlquery.select: select distinct c650000001 clist,c650000002 ccode from {WF:Config_EL_00_Province} order by ccode

sqlquery.name: SQL_Fault_City
sqlquery.select: select distinct c.c650000004 clist,c.c650000002 ccode from {WF:Config_EL_00_Province} p, {WF:Config_EL_00_City} c where 1=1 and p.c650000001=c.c650000001 $directpar$ order by nlssort(clist,'NLS_SORT=SCHINESE_PINYIN_M')

sqlquery.name: SQL_Fault_Clientbrand
sqlquery.select: select distinct c650000001 clist,c650000002 ccode from {WF:Config_EL_TTM_CCH_UserBrand} order by ccode

sqlquery.name: SQL_Fault_EquipmentFactory
sqlquery.select: select distinct c650000001 clist,c650000002 ccode from {WF:Config_EL_00_EquipmentFactory} order by nlssort (clist,'NLS_SORT=SCHINESE_PINYIN_M')
